entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ❓ Survey: Repo contribution experience 2022 #64649
  • StreamPipeWriter doesn't dispose the inner stream on complete if flush fails #64639
  • FileStream leaks enormous amount of memory #64632
  • Native aot'ed shared libraries should not be unloadable on unix #64629
  • FileStream.Lock() differs in behaviour between Windows and Linux using .NET 6.0 #64634
  • [API Proposal]: Console: .ReadBool, .ReadInt, .ReadLong and so on #64621
  • Connecting a Blazor Client app to an Azure Service Bus? #64620
  • Assemblies compiled in 6.0 and main contain an incorrect TargetPlatformAttribute in their metadata #64616
  • JIT: Fold constant access to RVA #64613
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: _umul128 arm64 intrinsic support #64609
  • Generated XmlSerializers DLL (from Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator) cause FileNotFoundException when used in COM host #64608
  • Regressions in System.Xml.Linq.Perf_XName (FullPGO) #64626
  • Cannot use file stream for [*.deps.json]: No such file or directory #64606
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #64622
  • Ensure we set -ffp-contract=off on GCC #64604
  • System.Runtime work planned for .NET 7 #64603
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml work planned for .NET 7 #64602
    7.0.0
  • System.Linq work planned for .NET 7 #64601
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process work planned for .NET 7 #64600
    7.0.0
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 7 #64599
    7.0.0
  • System.Buffers work planned for .NET 7 #64598
    7.0.0
  • System.IO work planned for .NET 7 #64596
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: remove dependency on System.Drawing.Common from System.Runtime.Caching #64592
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests randomly fail with `The tasks argument included a null value. (Parameter 'tasks')` #64588
    7.0.0
  • jitstress test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256/Vector256_ro/Vector256_ro.sh throws an exception #64587
  • DllImportGenerator.UnitTests failure: The type or namespace name 'DllImportAttribute' could not be found #64586
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` failing #64585

Closed

  • [wasm][windows][aot] `emcc` fails to download `zlib` on rolling build, causing tests to fail #62553
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 failing at Decompress large gzip text #64577
  • Requested optimization when two registered services refer to the same target type #64351
  • Improve HostBuilder and WebApplicationBuilder ServiceCollection integration #61635
    7.0.0
  • Composite CG2 systemically fails to resolve certain generic instantiations #64170
    7.0.0
  • Supporting netstandard2.x platform specific target frameworks is causing unreasonable pain #64536
    7.0.0
  • AllowRenegotiation is ignored on Linux #63699
    7.0.0
  • GZipStream calling Flush before Dispose cause in more data being written when compressing #64590
  • PipeWriterStream.DisposeAsync should call CompleteAsync on the underlying pipe writer #64326
  • MonoTests.System.Drawing.TestBitmap fail on Linux arm on checked coreclr #37082
    Future
  • Seg fault in System.Drawing.Common tests on Unix #23784
    Future
  • Arm64: Prefer fmul and fadd/fsub to fmadd/fnmsub #64591
  • Consider reducing HeaderDescriptor size by using object field #62847
    Future
  • Fix Behavior Differences in Unix System.Drawing.Common #22221
    Future
  • TryConvertIanaIdToWindowsId empy output on server #64526
    Future
  • WritableBitmap is not updating after updating the BackBuffer #64605
  • SuperPMI collect of benchmarks fails with "UnicodeEncodeError: 'charmap' codec can't encode character '\ufffd' in position 670361" #64575
    7.0.0
  • Should new APIs added to System.IO be excluded from MS.IO.Redist? #54919
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable Vector256 tests which are timing out #64653
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some flaky tests #64652
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ignore exit code returned from the merged wrappers #64651
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #64644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add tests for overlap and non-aligned ref fields. #64643
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Pass IV through cipher resets for OpenSSL and Android #64641
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Add an 'allow-loader-errors' AOT option. #64640
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector.Equals #64638
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Use `.short` directive instead of `.hword` #64637
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.3
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Handle ((IAsyncResult)task).AsyncWaitHandle.Dispose better in task completion #64627
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Throw PNSE if insufficient privileges when custom Ping payload was specified #64625
    area-System.Net
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Sum/Average/Max/Min for arrays and lists #64624
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Fix Issue 62756 Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #64619
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64618
    community-contribution
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64593
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm] Enable WasmTemplateTests on CI #64589
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • With `build -subset help` output "macro" subset components #64578
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 on windows, as we are already including the … #64628
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete NS2x runtime specific impls #64610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add incremental build instructions when ... #64396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable some PerformanceCounter tests on more platforms #64633
  • Roll out board automation for Jeremy & Levi #64617
    area-Meta
  • Minor cleanup for CryptoServiceProviders #64560
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use latest System.Memory.Data baseline version #64630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix client-initiated renegotiation on OpenSSL 3.0+ #64531
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [AOT] Use `.short` directive instead of `.hword` #64561
    community-contribution
  • Update ComputeHash to remove hash allocations for digest authentication #64005
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port vs4 mac fixes #64583
    area-System.IO
  • Update area-owners verbiage about FabricBot configuration for notifications #64595
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Implement operator delete on ThreadStressLog #64478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid CreateThreadStressLog under SpinLock #64421
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Override DisposeAsync in PipeWriterStream #64547
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Remove an allocation importing symmetric keys #64584
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix LLC cache issue on Apple M1 #64576
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Set language specific flags appropriately in mono #64454
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Do not add NRE sets for non-null addresses #64607
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move FabricBot generation scripts to dotnet/runtime #64324
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix several remaining IL tests I missed in my assembly name cleanup #64555
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent rid agnostic tfm to libs #64518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • superpmi: Catch errors while printing the unicode string #64597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAot: Allow disabling -pie flag #64580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use hash size constants where applicable #64218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Revert "Disable InspectVariableBeforeAndAfterAssignment test (#64546)" #64574
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add per-test ids, and save logs to files for the test, and proxy messages #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add alignment to mapped field stream #64559
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 6.0.3
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Local heap optimizations on Arm64 #64481
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase default HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout value to 30 seconds #63712
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • mono_get_generic_info_from_stack_frame fix for default interface methods #64566
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix debugger initialization #64523
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    community-contribution
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Allow use of overloaded methods when using LoggerMessage #64573
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64479
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64391
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-ios, 6.0.3
  • [wasm] Emscripten 2.0.34 bump #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/include/mono-2.0 #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test bug
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64032
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Import string.Empty as "" #64530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Remove unused variable, fix typos #64542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update mac Helix queues #64565
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • fix some test for FreeBSD #64426
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Optimize the remaining awaitable types in S.P.C. #64564
    community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-Meta
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: Is GetCryptographicallySecureRandomBytes allowed to block #1844
  • Direct PInvoke Calls with static lib seems not working for NativeAOT-LLVM WebAssembly? #1842
  • Is it possible to include the c source file in csproj instead of statically linking against a unmanaged library? #1841

Closed

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: For WebAssembly imports, DllImport Value misuse? #1390

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for controlling the import name used for PInvokes. #1845
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] map runtimeimports to their native name for ldftn #1843

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable IL scanner for LLVM to enable precomputed vtable slots #1834
  • Complete NativeAOT experiment #1789

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • self-contained warning should be suppressed for iOS #23705
  • .Net Core 3.1 GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined #23698
  • Automatically include Win32 application manifests in the build #23694

Closed

  • Unable to update .NET6 workloads with 6.0.200-preview.22055.15 #23653
  • Self-upgrade dotnet via CLI #23700
  • `dotnet test --blame-crash` collects crash DMP even after successful test runs #14578
  • `dotnet run` swallows Posix signals on Unix #23683
  • dotnet test is too noisy #21150
  • Xunit output from dotnet test truncated #19883
  • dotnet tool install fails #11244
  • Sync with `dotnet test` ends #4132
  • dotnet test - allow to specify msbuild properties #23198
  • How to test .NET on macOS Arm64 #21404
  • `dotnet test --arch x64` fails #21391
  • Commas result in unexpected results in `dotnet test` #23481

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 6.0.103 #23703
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.406 #23702
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't split collect command into multiple collect commands (#22666) #23696
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Cherry pick build config changes #23686
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.212 #23701
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • fix dotnet run infinite loop by rendering help explicitly #23688
    Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: User-defined positional patterns #4131

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create relaxing_shift_operator_requirements.md proposal document #5712

Updated

  • Support for ref struct as generic arguments #5689

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DiagnosticDescriptor does not validate help link URI #59205
  • GeneratorDriverState and GeneratorState should be records #59199
  • Consider separating HideAdvancedMembers from CompletionOptions to a separate options struct #59197
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "checked operators" #59196
  • Consider negating options with non-default(T) default values #59195
    Backlog
  • Test plan for ref fields #59194
  • Test plan for pattern matching on `ReadOnlySpan<char>` #59191
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes for certain solution after setting net6.0 instead of net5.0 #59190
  • Event add-remove accessors references are not displayed in Find All References #59189

Closed

  • Test plan for Attributes on Main for top level programs #59193
  • Developers can move code with ease #58274
    Backlog
  • VBCSCompiler.exe Induces 11 GCs Every 30 Seconds When Not Handling Requests #44313

PullRequests

Created

  • Break out navigate-to specific index components into a separate index. #59206
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringsLiterals #59204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Do not use SyntaxWalker to visit an arbitrary syntax tree in order to avoid a stack overflow. #59203
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #59202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Features/rename_UI_rework Merge Main #59201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address a few param-nullchecking feedback items #59200
    Area-IDE
  • Update 3rd party usages that came in from json parsing. #59188
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Validate Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections.Package on net6.0 #59187
    Area-IDE
  • Add minimal key option for GetDeterministicKey #59186
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Revert "Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options (#59083)" #59198
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Record status for various features #59192
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59185
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers
  • Update paths in `.vscode/launch.json` due to TFM changes #59108
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on options from IDiagnosticService #59096
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Roslyn.Hosting.Diagnostics.csproj #59167
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add external access API for find usages #59144
    Area-IDE
  • Add refactoring to convert normal (or verbatim) strings to raw strings. #59180
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • Update to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing 1.1.1-beta1.22081.4 #59181
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor-server sign in option. #39928
  • Support XML-based OpenAPI docs for minimal APIs #39927
    .NET 7 Planning
  • AuthenticationService.js 404 not found in Blazor Multi Application #39922
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921
  • Route order not respected for "*" host #39920
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #39919
  • cachedFunction of JSInterop causes memory leaks #39918
  • Should `failureMessage` in `AuthenticateResult` be nullable? #39916
  • OutOfMemoryException caused by user-code in ASP.NET Core runtime #39913
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware doesn't always log request body #39911
  • LogLevel Warning is somewhat verbose for LoggerEventIds.VerifyUserTokenFailed in the UserManager #39910
  • EnableAuthenticatorModel shows page even if user was not found #39909
  • Why BadHttpRequest is logged twice (as INFO and ERROR) #39907
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: The provided expression contains a PropertyExpression which is not supported. FieldIdentifier only supports simple member accessors (fields, properties) of an object #39906
    5.0.x
  • IIS: Using Windows Authentication assigns ClaimsPrincipal to User if AuthenticationSchemes are defined in an AuthorizationPolicy #39901

Closed

  • Twitter OAuth2 support #39664
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes #39902
  • Develop RDLC Generating Library for Cross Plateform #39912
  • Hot reload runs stale build #37136
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.SignalRClientTest` #39914
  • Locking issues with multiple dotnet watch processes with shared dependencies #38800
  • With .NET 7.0 SDK, I cannot create .NET 6.0 web project, the target net6.0 can't be found. #39731
    7.0-preview1
  • I have this issue with asp.net run in the back-end #39844
  • FromServices in MVC package instead of DependencyInjection? #39881
  • SignalR can't invoke server method from client with throttled connection #39885
  • Perf regression: endpoint #39883

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding support to infer FromServices parameters #39926
    area-mvc
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #39924
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #39923
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39905
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39904
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Extend disable component governance for linux #39925
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39681
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39903
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 3.1 #39467
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.23
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.2.22078.1 #39895
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Split/remove new ItemsSource interfaces #4457
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Maybe change return of IGroupableItemsViewSource.GetGroupAndIndex to record #4456
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • controls like "chips" should be part of standard library #4452

    6.0.300-preview.14
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #4450

  • [WinUI, Shell] Convert bottom tabs on WinUI Shell to using HierarchicalNavigationItems #4448
  • Add IHotReloadableView to all relevant parts of Controls #4445
  • corner radius for entry control should be part of standard library #4442
  • [Blazor webview] Exception handling for blazor webview #4441
  • Attached debugger doesn't stop on startup exceptions #4440

Closed

  • Fix how our ViewHandler exposes out INativeViewHandler.NativeView and cleanup GetWrappedNativeView #4366
  • Blazor startup errors for duplicate routes is hard to discover and debug #3695
  • MAUI Projects do not show platform specific .cs C# code files except for the first TFM in the TargetFrameworks list #4410
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Shell pages cannot work with DI #3147
    .NET 7
  • Cannot change Android SDK version from 31 to a lower one. #4404
  • [WinUI] Finish filling in all the styling mappers on WinUI TabbedPageHandler #4260
  • [Shell] Application crashes Page constructor arg cannot resolve type from service provider (wrong constructor used) #4318
  • Shell page dependency resolution optimization #4280

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
  • Ensure that using the AndExpand Grid hack doesn't null out BindingContext #4455
  • Add provisionator to windows #4453
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443

  • Implement EvaluateJavaScriptAsync method in WebView #4435
    area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • [loc]Add Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Tasks reference #4439
    area/templates 📄
  • Fix INativeViewHandler to return more expected NativeView #4432
  • Remove ambiguity in updates in WinUI #4454
  • Add an item group for all the platform folders #4430
  • Move Xaml.VisualDiagnostics to Maui.Core #4333
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Backport preview 13 fixes #4434
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4433
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix coherent dependency #4436
  • [WinUI] Wire up the rest of the TabbedPage properties #4429
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Shell page dependency injection now uses IServiceProvider.GetService() #4281
    area/shell 🐢
  • Make sure all @(Compile) items appear in the Solution Explorer #4411
    6.0.200-preview.13

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Small refactoring in DbContextFactorySource<TContext>.CreateActivator static method | Reduce condition nesting #27339
  • Bulk import for efficient importing of data from the client into the database #27333
  • `The 'bool' property 'X' on entity type 'Y' is configured with a database-generated default` for type: `bit` #27332
  • Why do IQueryables produced by methods other than OrderBy(Descending) satisfy the `is IOrderedQueryable` condition? #27330
  • Calling setter for ICollection of navigation properties #27329
  • Support IMutableNavigation.SetJsonPropertyName/IReadOnlyNavigation.GetJsonPropertyName - CosmosDB Provider #27328
  • `Include()` in EF Core adds more items to list than are in database #27327

Closed

  • First migration rollback does not delete the __EFMigrationsHistory table #27300
  • Allow to customize an alias in model binding #27296
  • Support for EF Core 3.1 on .NET Framework #27294
  • How to Delete Children Of Parent manually from db with deletion behaviour Cascade Delete with required FK? #27286
  • InvalidOperationException with HasPeriodStart and InMemoryDatabase #27277
  • Aps #27250
  • Context Prematurely Disposed While In Scope #27246
  • Seeding one-to-many relationships #27208
  • ValueConverterAttribute for Smart Enums and simple Value Objects #27313

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27338
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27337
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27336
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Allow migration tests to specify migrations options #27331

Merged

  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Update build and test machines #27238
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27236
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27235
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #27334
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #27335

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
